column4: can anyone help me with this?  My laptop crashed because water was spilled on the keyboard.  I have some very important files that I want to get off of my laptop... it boots but the keyboard doesn't work and it keeps beeping when I turn it on
check out the POST beeps they tell you stuff
yes those are telling you whats going on... different beeps for different problems, POST
your best bet is to take out the drive and mount it on another machine
